campaigns.name: Into the Abyss
campaigns.description: Underdark adventure in possible the most incricate political story of all DND

items.name: Potion of Healing
items.description: Heals 1d8+2 once. Is consumed on use.

items.name: Gold Staff
items.description: A golden staff. Has no magical power.

items.name: A rock
items.description: A regular rock from the ground

monsters.name: Drow Warrior
monsters.description: A ruthless warrior of the underdark in service to Lolth

monsters.name: Hook Horror
monsters.description: A beaked demon from the underdark equipped with menacing arms

segments.name: Imprisoned
segments.synopsis: The party starts off inside of a prison in the Underdark. They are guarded by wretches and drow warriors. They are surrounded by many other prisoners.

segments.name: Outbreak
segments.synopsis: The party revolts and attacks the prison guards.

segments.name: The Matron of the Outpost
segments.synopsis: The party continues being prisoners. A drow warrior starts to speak to them about his troubles with a matron.

segments.name: Escape
segments.synopsis: The party devises an escape plan. They gather the NPCs and make a run for it.

segments.name: Many Paths
segments.synopsis: The party has to decide where to go next. The NPCs offer some suggestions.
